story: As you move deeper into the gang's stronghold, you come across a room filled with blinking lights and whirring machinery. What do you do?

actions.action: Hack into the machines to discover their purpose
actions.good: Your hacking skills pay off as you successfully uncover the gang's secret operation, revealing valuable intel and a cache of loot. Your tech prowess has led you to a major discovery.
actions.bad: While attempting to hack into the machines, your actions trigger an automatic defense system, damaging you and sending alerts throughout the stronghold. Your efforts result in no discoveries.

actions.action: Disrupt the machines to cause chaos and confusion
actions.good: With a display of impressive technical prowess, you successfully disrupt the machines, causing chaos and confusion amongst the gang members. You use this opportunity to slip away with some loot.
actions.bad: Your attempt to disrupt the machines triggers an alarm, alerting nearby guards to your location. The disrupted machinery starts malfunctioning, and you take damage while slipping away with nothing but a headache.

actions.action: Observe the machines silently to gather information
actions.good: As you remain undetected, you quietly observe the machines' functions, revealing valuable intel about the gang's operations. You return to your base with rich insights and some unspecified but valuable loot.
actions.bad: While remaining silent and unnoticed, you accidentally stumble upon a pressure plate, setting off an alarm. Poisonous gas fills the room, causing damage as you hurriedly escape without any loot.
